computeInterestRate(address,uint256,uint.details: For security (Euler convention), only the vault itself can call this function.

params: /* r */ Unused reserve/cash param (kept for interface compatibility).
params.vault: The authorized vault address (must equal msg.sender).

returns.rate: The per-second interest rate in RAY (1e27).

computeInterestRateView(address,uint256,.details: Mirrors the authorized version but without the caller check.

returns.rate: The per-second interest rate in RAY (1e27).

params.aprBps: APR expressed in basis points. Example:               - 100  = 1.00% APR               - 500  = 5.00% APR               - 1000 = 10.00% APR

computeInterestRate(address,uint256,uint.notice: Mutable/authorized path to fetch the current per-second rate (RAY).

computeInterestRateView(address,uint256,.notice: View-only path to fetch the per-second rate (RAY), callable by anyone.
